thread.section_title: Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top class
thread.title_full: Top class - Review of Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MarkSofPerth
title: Top class
text: Stayed for 4 days in Dec with 3 kids, excellent rooms with great beds and interiors... great service, impressive bar and very good food. Location is about as good as it gets in Paris, central to everything and surrounded by stunning shops and cafes.... Hotel mgt and concierge were brilliant and service levels from staff were really good. First stay in Sofitel brand and will be back.
